'''A log of ships coming in and out by Little Meng''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from [[Little Meng]] during the {{Quest|One Ship, Two Ships, Three Ships...}}. It is used to remind the player the number of boats Little Meng saw enter or leave the harbor so that the number of ships docked can be calculated.
